title: runtime: fix freebsd signal handling
body:
Core was generated by `go_bootstrap'.
Program terminated with signal 11, Segmentation fault.
#0  0x000000000043b9a4 in ?? ()
$ 6nm go_bootstrap | grep 43b ?
43b8f3 T runtime.setitimer
 43b909 T time.now
 43b93a T runtime.nanotime
$ 6nm go_bootstrap | sort | grep -C 5 nanotime
000000000043b8a5 T runtime.exit
000000000043b8b6 T runtime.write
000000000043b8cb T runtime.raisesigpipe
000000000043b8f3 T runtime.setitimer
000000000043b909 T time.now
000000000043b93a T runtime.nanotime
000000000043b96c T runtime.sigaction
000000000043b989 T runtime.sigtramp
000000000043b9dc T runtime.mmap
000000000043ba01 T runtime.munmap
000000000043ba1a T runtime.notok


Russ
so 43b9a4 is in the middle of sigtramp
so we suck at signal handling
that explains some things.
